import { useState } from 'react' import { FaUser } from "react-icons/fa" import { toast } from "react-toastify" const Register = () => { const [formData, setFormData] = useState({ name: "", email: "", password: "", password2: "" }) const { name, email, password, password2 } = formData const handleChange = (e) => { setFormData((preState) => ({ ...preState, [e.target.id]: e.target.value })) } const handleSubmit = (e) => { e.preventDefault() if (password !== password2) { toast.error("Passwords does not match.") } } return ( <>
